content.p: Free hopper buses make it easy to travel between the main University Park Campus and other campuses. Our blue buses have: You'll also enjoy free Wi-Fi while you travel. Local bus timetables and routes Hopper bus service Our buses run regularly from University Park to Jubilee, Sutton Bonington and King's Meadow campuses, and the Royal Derby Hospital Centre. Our hopper bus service is available to all staff and students. To also see local bus timetables and routes, visit the bus service web page
